runs.comm: oooh, turn straight away and the Australians are excited. The umpire doesn't share in it and the leg-before appeal goes to waste. Good length ball grips, as Afridi had predicted, and grazes the pad through towards fine leg
slower through the air on a good length, this is left alone as he sees it outside off
a little flatter this time and this time Zia is able to use the room to cut away to the sweeper
tossed up on the pads again and Shehzad clips it calmly behind square leg
a little flight and that gets Zia's attention. Tries to drill the ball down the  ground, but mistimes it
"catch it," they cry as Zia gets into a powerful sweep. Lined up the fuller ball and gave it all he had. But Phil Hughes at square leg dives and makes a good save

this one ends up a full toss on off stump with a little inswing. And what seemed an innocent little delivery turns out to spark Brad Haddin. Comes up and has a stern chat with Shehzad, who gestures in a way for Haddin to back off. Scuffle breaks away as the square leg umpire approaches
sliding down leg again, that inswing he's looking for is skewing his radar. Tickled to the fine leg boundary
on a good length around the off stump this time and its blocked capably
back of a lenght and outside off, left alone with ease
chased after that and is beaten. Lovely fuller ball that was angled across the right-hander, teasing the drive. He got it but the outside edge is not forthcoming
this time it is but the edge is too thick for first slip, Finch leaps to his left to track down this fuller ball fired in at 146 kph outside off, can't reach it
lofted over extra cover! Maxwell follows its progress and is pleased to see the fielder running around to keep it to two
pulls his length back just a touch but it was still slow enough. Zia waits and cuts to deep point

he's been trying to force the pace and perishes in the attempt. A swat to mid-off where Richardson picks up a smart catch low to his right. The short ball seemed to hold up on the pitch and he was falling away to the leg side as he sought to bludgeon the ball square on the off side. All he ended up was lobbing it down the ground
flighted and a tad outside off, Amin opens the blade to backward point
quicker and flatter outside off, Amin goes for a cut but isn't fast enough with his hands

he's not the only one, Uzair! Runs down the track after just three balls faced. This doesn't seem like the pitch to do that and Maxwell makes him pay. The tossed up delivery grips and turns right across his ugly slog and Haddin does the rest. Amin tries his hardest to stretch his back leg to safety but he has lunged too far down the track
good length ball across the right-hander, pushed into covers

oh, almost a brilliant take from Haddin. Took flight to his right and tried to grab a fuller delivery, curling in. But it had started well down the leg side and was going further. Too quick for the keeper
pushes Shehzad back in the crease and the ball thuds into his bat. Short cover is quick to prevent any thoughts of a single
full and wide, a little too much so to invite the batsman's interest. Luckily though, he doesn't invite the umpire's either. That was very close to the wide line
shot! It's all fine and dandy working the left-armer's angle but when you pitch it short it sets the batsman to drill it in front of point. Largely with a straight bat. Lovely shot
that's a lovely response. A good length ball probing in the corridor and it ducks back in after pitching. Shehzad shuffles across to protect his stumps and leaves
short and rising towards his chest, Shehzad plays it well as he gets up off his toes and blocks with soft hands. The Aussie fielders are all over him. They don't want to give any quarter here
missed stumping! Maqsood had overbalanced as he was trying to flick down the leg side. Beautiful lure from Maxwell worked quite well until Haddin doesn't stay low enough and fumbles
good length ball on middle and leg, nudged away off his pads
defends on middle and leg again as Maxi strangles Pakistan

timberrrrr! Again his footwork does not afford him enough balance. This ball was a little too full and he got a little too close to it and then drives outside the line. Almost yorked himself as the ball turned from off stump to hit the target
there was a leg slip in play and Maxi tries to get him in the game by tossing the ball up on the pads. Gets a little too much turn than he's used to and beats the keeper, and Finch
looped up outside off, Nasim leans into a square drive and watches an inside edge wander towards fine leg
pushed through on off stump, Shehzad shuffles across and works it away to deep midwicket
loads of flight there as Nasim tucks it behind square leg for a single
back of a good length and outside off, Nasim watches it carefully through to the keeper's gloves
takes a shimmy forward and Starc doesn't like that. Sends down a good length ball that rips across the outside edge. At some pace too. Bowler has a little advice for the debutant
fuller on off stump, Nasim is perched in his crease and blocks
shortish and on the pads, Nasim places it to the right of the man at midwicket. But Abbott is quick and he pulls off a dive to keep it to a single. Brilliant effort
back of a good length on middle and leg, Shehzad is squared up as he defends. And looks like we've got Misbah-ul-Haq in the house. With a little grey in his beard
fuller and outside off, Shehzad inches forward ot drive through the off side but has to settle for an inside edge
and it's a rank long hot. Way too short and it turns further outside off, the batsman gets set up with his feet wide apart and pulls through midwicket
keeps to a shorter length, but does get turn and bounce. Shehzad was thinking about cutting it but decides against it
tossed up on off stump, Shehzad gets forward and leaves. Startling turn again. Almost like the man he is trying to imitate (albeit poorly) with his action
taken at slip! A touch shorter, a touch closer to off stump. Shehzad got back and was trying to cut it away but ends up offering a sharp catch to Finch off an outside edge
tossed up on middle, Akmal gets forward to block with a dead bat

that's a beauty! Began with a delivery he'd like to forget very quickly but this one, he'd want to hold on to. Gets drift on middle and leg and then rips it right across the tamely poking bat. Gorgeous legspin bowling
back of a length and outside off, Nasim taps it into the covers and sets off. That's well done. Beats the incoming Smith
shortish and outside off, he opens the face and guides to deep third man
closes the face too early and Richardson was flirting with a debut wicket too. This back of a good length delivery holds up and lures the leading edge but it goes to the right of point
gets on top of the bounce and thumps the short ball towards point, Maxi dives to his right and pulls off another bright save

why would he play that?! Threw his bat at a length ball like it was the last one he might ever play and skies it. It's a swirlier. Shoots up into the Dubai sky but it's no match for a coolly back-tracking Warner from mid-off
short and a shade outside off, rides the bounce to third man
he's settled into a lovely line. Tossed up on off stump and he drifts it in as well. However after the ball pitches it veers past the outside edge
lobs up a full toss as he gets thrown out by Nasim moving around in the crease, Sinks to one-knee and slogs it to deep square leg
a shorter ball on middle and off, rocks back and flat bats to long-on
waits on the back foot as he lines up a short-pitched ball, lets it turn and slaps it through the covers to get off the mark

the flight he is concentrating on is fetching him some enticing turn. Nasim was again trying to move to off stump to throw Boyce off. Doesn't succeed and is made to follow the delivery with an open face. Falls short of slip though
feigns to shift outside off again and gets a leading edge into the covers as he tries to pick up a single through the on side.
starts off with a shorter ball on middle, Nasim plays a short-armed pull through square leg
banged in short and it lures a hook out of Afridi, but the ball was sliding down the leg side
gets across outside off and whips the length ball through midwicket

back of a length on middle and leg, Nasim jumps up on leg stump to try and work it away. A little too quick for him and the ball lobs up towards point. They go for a quick single as Maxi hunts the ball down, swivels around the hurls a throw at the bowler's end. Instead he finds the bowler himself. That's gonna sting for Abbott, no matter if Maxi runs all the way to give him a pat
well, this should help soothe the pain. Fires it in full on off stump, Afridi plans his front leg down and goes for a heave. Misses. Hit in front and the umpire sends him packing
brilliant bowling from Abbott. Finds the yorker and it curls in late on leg stump, Anwar blocks it
good length ball on middle and off, Anwar gets forward to defend
that's the legspinner's curse. Can look absolutely breathtaking when he beats the outside edge, but this time he bowls a full toss on middle and is swept away to deep square leg
nicely flighted and angled in on leg stump, Anwar stays beside it and defends
tries to force a drive down the ground as Boyce loops it in on leg stump. Good flight again and Anwar is almost yorked
nice and slow through the air just outside off, Anwar is forward to block
a touch shorter on off stump and punches down the ground. Boyce dives but can't stop it
drags this one down quite short and very wide too. Nasim somehow reaches it and cuts to deep point
digs it into the middle of the pitch, Nasim directs it to fine leg to bring up the Pakistan fifty.
fuller and a shade outside off and its lifted over the top of the extra cover region. Nicely done.
tucked around the corner as this was shortish and angled in at him
that's stunning. Gets his front leg down the line and cracks the fuller ball outside off through a spectacularly diving cover fielder and past mid-off for a few runs
rises up with his back of a length delivery and tries to guide it away to third man. Only edges and it drops short of the lone slip fielder. It was bowled across the seam
banged in short, Nasim pulls and keeps it down to square leg
positioned his back leg well outside off stump and Boyce keeps the shorter ball outside off, pulled to deem midwicket
he's been doing that all night. Tosses it up above the eye-line, gets it to dip and drift in, then the ball pitches and scurries away past the outside edge

oh dear, that's not a wicket-taking delivery. it was short, it had width. It should have been cut and sent screaming away to the boundary. But instead he looks to pull, and he wants to pull so very very hard. Almost went off his feet there and after all that effort and he ends up miscues it to mid-on
flighted on off stump, defended
tossed up on middle and leg, defended off the front foot
this time he gets it to turn off a good length and boy it is big! Wahab tries to follow it with an angled blade but it's ripped off the deck too much
a little short to start off with and Nasim backs away and cuts with the spin to the sweeper
lures him on the drive with a flighted ball outside off, Wahab looks to drill it through the covers and is beaten soundly
but when it's short it sits up on this pitch, sometimes a little too much which is the cause for a few dismissals today. This time though Wahab has cut it past point
tossed up outside off, Nasim had already moved that way to try and upset the spinner. Doesn't happen and has to just defend
a little shorter and outside off, Nasim cracks it in front of point
a little too much flight there and Wahab slaps the full toss down the ground
shortish and a shade outside off, steered away to deep third man
worked away off his thighs as this 137 kph delivery wanders away towards deep square leg
gets up off the crease and tries to nudge a shortish ball for a quick single towards point. Maxwell is not quite so keen on letting that happen. But his shy at the stumps affords an overthrow
that's a top-edge and but that boundary remains elusive. This was banged and it got up quite high. Can't keep it down and has to settle for a couple
shortish and pushes him back in the crease, opens the face towards the covers. Seems to be hurrying the batsmen
good length ball on middle and off, tapped away towards the covers
good length ball on off stump, defended as best he could
works this back of a length ball off his pads into the midwicket region.
full and pushed across the right-hander, Nasim pushes through to the sweeper. Gets a clap from his captain in the dressing room
tucks him up on a good length, pushed down to long-on for a single, if a touch awkwardly
this is a full toss, driven through the covers

jumps down the track while making room for himself, Starc saw him coming and slung in the yorker on the base of off stump. Hits his target and Australlia huddle up again. Finch claps in earnest as Nasim departs. He wants to go for the kill
back of a length on off stump, defended carefully
belted down the ground. That's the end of the drought then. Cleared his front leg and drilled it down the ground. Monstrous hit
that time the shorter ball got on him too quickly, Wahab tries to pull and gets it too high on the bat. Single towards long-on
short on and around off stump, he drags it with a pull towards midwicket
back of a length on off stump, Wahab opens the face for a single but Maxwell is at point and he isn't so accommodating
fuller and outside off, driven smartly towards the covers. A little indecision before Raza is sent back. In his hurry he plonks the bat, it gets caught in the grass and might well have been run out
made room for himself, Abbott saw him and slants the ball down leg side. Another tick for the extras. This was at 139kph
banged in short, Wahab backs away and clubs it to deep midwicket
length on middle and off, Wahab lofts it down the ground to long-on
short and well directed, Raza ties to pull the 136 kph delivery away but was into the shot too early. Struck on the elbow
another short ball, rising towards the chest, Raza shuffles inside the line and pulls to deep fine leg for a couple
full on off stump, driven smartly back down the ground
shuffles across and clips a good length ball through to deep square leg. Couple taken again
goes short on leg stump, Raza gets across on off stump and nurdles it behind square leg

that's the slower ball off the back of the hand, Wahab gets down on one knee for a big mow over midwicket. The slowness of the pitch though produces a top edge that soars into the air. Mitchell Start from square leg runs to his right, he has enough time considering how long that hung in the air. But this is by no means a simple catch. Judges it extremely well and pulls it off with a full-length dive
back of a length on leg stump, clipped away past the diving wicketkeeper and Raza gets the score ticking as best as he can
back of a length on middle and, defended

gets across on off stump and turns it away behind square leg. Raza's been living on these couples but Irfan is quite sluggish. No direct hit though which means he gets those extra seconds to save himself
short and a shade outside off, Raza pulls down and to square leg. He's played a decent hand here
shortish and angled in, Raza whips it away into the man at deep midwicket
length ball on off stump, Irfan cleared his front leg and slapped it back at the bowler
slugged it to mid-off as he meets the fuller ball on off stump with a brutal slice
shortish and outside off, Raza tries to belt it over the top of the off-side field. No connection
ran away outside off to try and scoop a fuller ball over fine leg. Again no connection and the ball clipped the back pad and almost knocked over the stumps.
back of a length and outside off, Irfan swings and misses
